WHITE HOUSE CONFERENCE ON HIGHWAY SAFETY
GENERAL SERVICES BUILDING
WASHINGTON 25, D. C.
TO THE EDITOR:
Leaders of public information media are mobi¬
lizing support for the White House Conference on
Highway Safety, which President Eisenhower has
called for February 17, 18 and 19, in Washington.
You will doubtless be hearing more about this
soon from the Conference Media Group, headed by
Charles F. McCahill of the CLEVELAND NEWS,
immediate past president of the American News¬
paper Publishers Association.
Meanwhile, I thought that you would like to
have the attached “Fact Sheet’’ concerning the
Conference, and a copy of President Eisenhower’s
letter to the forty-eight Governors, asking their co¬
operation. Perhaps this material may suggest ideas
for news or feature article, editorials or cartoons.
H. B. Miller, Rear Admiral,
U.S.N., Retired
Conference Director
